text: Ezɨ Moses ghua kamaghɨn Aron ko an otaribav gɨa ghaze, “Ia asɨzir tuzir kam inigh God bativamin Purirpenimɨn tiar akamɨn mangɨ, egh anevigh bretɨn akɨramɨn itim sara damɨ. God ia mɨkemezɨ moghɨra, Iarara dar amɨ. Akɨrar bret itir kam, me an aven bret isa gumazibagh ami me ofa gamir gumazibar otivasa ofa gami.
